songs.title: Dime Piece (feat. Izzy) (Promo Only clean edit)
songs.lyrics:
(Chorus:)
It's driving me outta my mind
That's why it's so hard for me to find
(Repeat)

(Verse 1)
Dime piece definition of a chick
Nice, sweet educated independent fly thang
Way she fillin up dem jeans gotta tear drop like Visine
Like WHOOP shawty stuck it out had da touch it
OOPS I could make it juz jump in my COUPE
Wit a diamonds and jewels
I see Jimmy Choo in yo designer shoes
Momma listen u ain't neva heard a flow like diz one
Who u kno Gigalo and still Christian
Lil shawty stop trippin if Don once a bishop
Why Nick can't be pimpin
PLEASE I'm juz trynna get you in VIN-KISS
Wait take a minute take a flick juz FREEZE
Cuz u kno da Cannon be flashin I'm gettin more head den a aspirin
I'm askin are u a dime da dime

(Chorus:)
It's driving me outta my mind (Hey Ladies)
That's why it's so hard for me to find (Hey Ladies)
(Repeat)

(Verse 2 (Izzy))
Nick you lookin for a Dyme
Izz gotta a 9 da dick put em high
Call a Nina Sky Money ova dare
And I ain't got time but to get brain from a dime
Now daz changin yo mind
My dick feelz for you like Shocacon
Flip head and tails wen I tossin yo mind
They call me Izzy you kno
Single the I den double the Z den say it wit a Y
Where all my ladies dat single da nite
At da strip club got me throwing singles da nite
Da boy poisin da beat be da IV on da mic
What dem dime say wen Iz on da mic
(Go Izzy, Go Izzy) Feeling me why can't even name all da 10's on da mic
Dat Ronda, Bonnie, Vicky, wit choice
Is she a born again wit sum dick in her life
Is you a dime da dime?

(Chorus:)
It's driving me outta my mind (Hey Ladies)
That's why it's so hard for me to find (Hey Ladies)
(Repeat)
Are you a dime

(Hook)
All da ugly chicks be quite (Hey, Hey)
If you fly get a drink ill buy it (Hey, Hey)
At da end of the nite I might hit (Hey, Hey)
Cuz I like it, I love it, can I ball on the beat make a club hit

(Verse 3)
It's like taste, wut lick who
Daz wut Nick do
Got a lot of chicks dat love my sick moves
Do wut a pimp do move how a pimp do move
Get a tatoo ma use my intitals
Now we got issues and rumors da clear up
Sex real loud next room dey can here us
I'm lookin for a dime dat can take the whole 9
Check the sex tapes if you think I'm lyin
Are you a dime da dime

(Chorus:)
It's driving me outta my mind (Hey Ladies)
That's why it's so hard for me to find (Hey Ladies)
(Repeat)
Are you a dime?
